price: Haasa'a keessan gadi qabaa yookiin ol qabaa; Inni beekaa waan qoma keessaati.
arabic: وَأَسِرُّواْ قَوۡلَكُمۡ أَوِ ٱجۡهَرُواْ بِهِۦٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-asirrū qawlakum awi ij'harū bihi innahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
